table.caption: Wyrmling Goals
rows: Establish independence from adult dragons (or other powerful creatures)
Acquire one valuable magic item or art object to build a hoard around
Acquire minions who will bring food and treasure
Establish dominance over other wyrmlings in the same brood
Secure a partnership with a more powerful creature for safety
Find a good spot for a first independent lair
table.name: Wyrmlings; Wyrmling Goals
